## ng-theme package

Implementation of the `themeStyles` directive to include theme level CSS variables.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AcNgThemeStylesModule](./ng-theme.acngthemestylesmodule.md) | Implementation of a module that exposes the <code>themeStyles</code> directive. |

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [VERSION](./ng-theme.version.md) | Version and build number of the package |
